title: What Role Do You Find The Best
body:
I played jg last season and after learning how to play the game I made an account and got it to gold 5 0lp {{sticker:galio-happy}} 
but now I've mostly  just playing mid with a sprinkle of bot/support cause I grew to dislike the jungle role even though I 
was better at it, I'm hard stuck silver now BTW :( but still, have more fun playing mid then I did playing jg

Have you ever played more than one role and what role do you find the most fun?

replies.body: Top lane for sure. You can affect the map in so many ways and manipulate the enemy team without them realising.
{{champion:85}} Currenlty lvling my onetrick kennen account so i dont have a choice {{champion:85}}
jungle is the best role cause u get to give ur team a lead and affect the map while other roles just say in lane for like first 15 minutes
